item.title: Remembering Fitzgeralds Hotel & Casino: A Downtown Las Vegas Legend
item.description:
A Lucky Charm on Fremont Street

For decades, a towering green and shamrock-laden presence graced the eastern end of Fremont Street: Fitzgeralds Hotel & Casino. More than just a casino, Fitzgeralds represented a distinct era of downtown Las Vegas â€“ one of approachable gaming, quirky theming, and a vibrant, energetic atmosphere. Today, it lives on as The D Las Vegas, but the memories of its former identity remain strong with many long-time Vegas visitors.
